appraisal.reason: Weekday and Sunday confession times match the newsletter. However, on Saturdays confessions are 10:00-11:00 and 5:00-5:50pm, not until 6:00pm. Please note the Saturday evening session concludes at 5:50pm as published.

According to the newsletter, weekday Confessions are from 12:15pm to 12:40pm, not from 12:00pm. On Saturdays, Confessions run from 5:30pm to 5:55pm, not until 6:00pm. No Confessions are listed for Sundays. Please consult the published schedule for accuracy.

name: Our Lady of Mount Carmel & St Simon Stock
